Verses: 1 leviyin Kudumbaththaaril Oruvan Leviyin Kumaaraththigalil Oruththiyai Vivaagampanninaan.
2 andha Sthiree Karppavadhiyaagi, Oru Aanpillaiyaip Petru, Adhu Azhagulladhu Endru Kandu, Adhai Moondru Maadham Oliththu Vaiththaal.
3 aval Adhai Appuram Oliththu Vaikkak Koodaamal, Oru Naanarpettiyai Eduththu, Adharkup Pisinum Keelum Poosi, Adhile Pillaiyai Valarththi, Nadhiyoramaai Naanalukkulle Vaiththaal.
4 adharku Enna Sambavikkum Enbadhai Ariyumbadi Adhin Thamakkai Dhooraththile Nindrukondirundhaal.

5 appozhudhu Paarvonudaiya Kumaaraththi Nadhiyil Snaanampanna Vandhaal; Avaludaiya Thaadhigal Nadhiyoraththil Ulaavinaargal; Aval Naanalukkulle Irukkira Pettiyaik Kandu, Than Thaadhiyai Anuppi Adhaik Konduvarumbadi Seydhaal.
6 adhaith Thirandhapodhu Pillaiyaik Kandaal; Pillai Azhudhadhu; Aval Adhinmel Irakkamutru, Idhu Ebireyar Pillaigalil Ondru Endraal.

7 appozhudhu Adhin Thamakkai Paarvonin Kumaaraththiyai Nokki: Umakku Indhap Pillaiyai Valarkkumbadi Ebireya Sthireegalil Paalkodukkira Oruththiyai Naan Poi Ummidaththil Azhaiththukkondu Varattumaa Endraal.
8 adharkup Paarvonudaiya Kumaaraththi: Azhaiththukkondu Vaa Endraal. Indhap Pen Poip Pillaiyin Thaayaiye Azhaiththukkonduvandhaal.

9 paarvonudaiya Kumaaraththi Avalai Nokki: Nee Indhap Pillaiyai Eduththukkondu Poi, Adhai Enakku Valarththidu, Naan Unakkuch Sambalam Kodukkiren Endraal. Andha Sthiree Pillaiyai Eduththukkondu Poi, Adhai Valarththaal.

10 pillai Peridhaanapodhu, Aval Adhaip Paarvonudaiya Kumaaraththiyinidaththil Kondupoi Vittaal. Avalukku Avan Kumaaranaanaan. Aval: Avanai Jalaththinindru Eduththen Endru Solli, Avanukku Mose Endru Perittaal.
11 mose Periyavanaana Kaalaththil, Avan Than Sagodhararidaththil Poi, Avargal Sumai Sumakkiradhaip Paarththu, Than Sagodhararaagiya Ebireyaril Oruvanai Oru Egipthiyan Adikkiradhaik Kandu,
12 angum Ingum Paarththu, Oruvarum Illai Endru Arindhu, Egipthiyanai Vetti, Avanai Manalile Pudhaiththup Pottaan.
13 avan Marunaalilum Veliye Ponapodhu, Ebireya Manushar Iruvar Sandai Pannikkondirundhaargal. Appozhudhu Avan Aniyaayamcheygiravanai Nokki: Nee Un Thozhanai Adikkiradhu Enna Endru Kettaan.

14 adharku Avan: Engalmel Unnai Adhigaariyaagavum Niyaayaadhibadhiyaagavum Erpaduththinavan Yaar? Nee Egipthiyanaik Kondru Pottadhu Pola, Ennaiyum Kondrupoda Ninaikkiraayo Endraan. Appozhudhu Mose Kaariyam Nichchayamaaga Velippattadhu Endru Bayandhaan.

15 paarvon Andhak Kaariyaththaik Kelvippattapodhu, Moseyaik Kolaiseyya Vagaithedinaan. Mose Paarvonidaththinindru Thappiyodi, Meedhiyaan Dhesaththil Poith Thangi, Oru Thuravandaiyile Utkaarndhirundhaan.

16 meedhiyaan Dhesaththu Aasaariyanukku Ezhu Kumaaraththigal Irundhaargal; Avargal Thangal Thagappanudaiya Aadugalukkuth Thanneer Kaattumbadikku Ange Vandhu, Thanneer Mondhu, Thottigalai Nirappinaargal.
17 appozhudhu Meyppargal Vandhu, Avargalaith Thuraththinaargal; Mose Ezhundhirundhu, Avargalukkuth Thunainindru, Avargaludaiya Aadugalukkuth Thanneer Kaattinaan.
18 avargal Thangal Thagappanaagiya Reguvelidaththil Vandhapodhu, Avan: Neengal Indru Iththanai Seekkiramaai Vandhadhu Enna Endru Kettaan.
19 adharku Avargal: Egipthiyan Oruvan Meypparin Kaigalukku Engalaith Thappuviththu, Engalukkuth Thanneer Mondhu Kotuththu, Aadugalukkum Thanneer Kaattinaan Endraargal.
20 appozhudhu Avan Than Kumaaraththigalaip Paarththu: Avan Enge? Andha Manidhanai Neengal Vittu Vandhadhu Enna? Bojanampannumbadikku Avanai Azhaiththukkondu Vaarungal Endraan.
21 mose Andha Manidhanidaththil Thangiyirukkach Sammadhiththaan. Avan Sipporaal Ennum Than Kumaaraththiyai Mosekkuk Koduththaan.
22 aval Oru Kumaaranaip Petraal. Naan Anniya Dhesaththil Paradhesiyaai Irukkiren Endru Solli, Avanukku Kersom Endru Perittaan.

23 silakaalam Sendrapin, Egipthin Raajaa Mariththaan. Isravel Puththirar Adimaiththanaththinaal Thaviththu, Muraiyittukkondirundhaargal; Avargal Adimaiththanaththilirundhu Muraiyidum Saththam Dhevasannidhiyil Ettinadhu.
24 dhevan Avargal Perumoochchaik Kettu, Thaam Aabiragaamodum Eesaakkodum Yaakkobodum Seydha Udanbadikkaiyai Ninaivukoorndhaar.
25 dhevan Isravel Puththiraraik Kannokkinaar; Dhevan Avargalai Ninaiththarulinaar.
